thread.title: BRIEF-S&P Says Hartford, CT 'CCC' GO Debt Rating Placed On Watch Positive

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-S&P Says Hartford, CT 'CCC' GO Debt Rating Placed On Watch Positive
text:
S&P Global Ratings:
* S&P SAYS HARTFORD, CONNECTICUT 'CCC' GO DEBT RATING PLACED ON WATCH POSITIVE DUE TO PROPOSED STATE FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE DEAL Source text: ( bit.ly/2Gixqnl )
